hrt: for(let y=0,x1=30,x2=30;y<20;x2--,x1++,y++){ setPixel(y,x1,'red') setPixel(y,x2,'red')} let xstart = 11 let xend = 49 let xcenter=11+((49-11)/2)for(let y=20,gap=0;y<30;gap++,xstart++,xend--,y++){ setPixel(y,xstart,'red')  setPixel(y,xend,'red')setPixel(y,xcenter-gap,'red')  setPixel(y,xcenter+gap,'red')}
